ygData.subject: Re: Questing
ygData.msgSnippet: I get most of mine off of either http://everquest.gamestats.com  or there is a EQ Clerics page I go to... I don t remember the URL but there is a link to it in
ygData.messageBody:
I get most of mine off of either http://everquest.gamestats.com or there is a EQ Clerics page I go to... I don't remember the URL but there is a link to it in the "links" section of http://www.eqdruids.com

Both have pretty good descriptions of the cleric armor quests. So far I've only done the quest for the cleric greaves... but I'm actually thinking of getting rid of the greaves and camping for gatorskin legs instead... I don't see the point of wearing greaves that improve my intelligence when I can get gatorskin leggings that improve my Wisdom.

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Sianne . <maggee1@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 11:29 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Questing


> From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>

> i would like to know where most of you get your questing info...i'm talking

> month or so , so i am a bit behind. But do any of you have any really good
> sites..i know about Alakhazam's ...but are there others?

> Sianne - 28th
